HELP_MSG:
[Poop Cleaner Bot](https://github.com/derogab/poop-cleaner) is a bot that helps you manage spam on a telegram group, thanks to the support of group members. When a message gets a predetermined number of reactions of type "ğŸ’©" the bot deletes the message from the group. 

Commands:
/start - Start the bot.
/help - Show this help message.
/auth - Show authenticated info.

Usage:
React with ğŸ’© to messages that you consider spam and believe should be deleted.
